aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.heading: Professional Appliance
aboutSection.description: Expert washing machine and refrigerator repair services in Riyadh. Our certified technicians provide reliable maintenance solutions for all major brands at competitive prices. Schedule your service appointment today.

secondSection.title: Why Choose Us
secondSection.heading: Trusted Appliance Repair
secondSection.description: Specializing in washing machine and refrigerator repairs with experienced, certified technicians. We deliver reliable solutions to keep your home appliances running smoothly.

step1.title: Schedule Service
step1.description: Book your appliance repair online or by phone. We offer flexible appointments that fit your schedule.

step2.title: Professional Diagnosis
step2.description: Our technicians inspect your appliance thoroughly and provide a detailed estimate before starting repairs.

step3.title: Complete Repair
step3.description: We use genuine parts and provide warranty coverage. Your satisfaction is guaranteed.

videoSection.description: Trust our experienced team for all your appliance repair needs. Comprehensive maintenance and repair solutions for washing machines and refrigerators.

testimonials.name: Ahmad Al-Saudi
testimonials.review: Excellent service! Professional technician arrived on time and repaired my washing machine quickly. Great quality work at reasonable prices.

testimonials.review: Reliable maintenance service for our properties. They handle all our appliances efficiently. Highly recommend their service packages.

testimonials.review: Professional team with excellent knowledge. Same-day commercial refrigerator repair. Outstanding emergency service!

testimonials.review: Outstanding service quality! They maintain all our appliances. Knowledgeable technicians and excellent support.

testimonials.review: Quick response and professional service. Fixed cooling issues within hours. Very impressed with their expertise.
